modName: ABT - Immersive Weapons 50 percent speed increase
summary:
Increases speed of arrows from Immersive Weapons by 50%

Must be below Immersive Weapons in load order.
descriptionHtml:
Increases speed of arrows from Immersive Weapons by 50%

Must be below Immersive Weapons in load order.
